description.value: An anatomical location specifies the location (e.g. foot) and laterality (e.g. links) of a bodypart.

purpose.value:
This CodeableConcept resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) AnatomicalLocation v1.0 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/AnatomicalLocation-v1.0(2020EN)).
Profilers can use this profile in places where zib AnatomicalLocation is instantiated. In addition to using this profile, the binding should be set to ValueSet "LocatieCodelijsten" (<http://decor.nictiz.nl/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.121.11.11--20200901000000>) with a binding strength of _required_.
